tourBios.intlVics: (6): 2013 Polokwane Classic [SAf]. 2014 Sun City Challenge [SAf]. 2015 Golden Pilsener Zimbabwe Open [SAf]. Lombard Insurance Classic [SAf]. Sun Windmill Challenge [SAf]. Vodacom Origins of Golf [SAf].
tourBios.curYearHigh: Has enjoyed a solid start to the European Tour season, having finished T11 (Alfred Dunhill Championship), T10 (BMW SA Open), T31 (Joburg Open) and most recently T4 (Tshwane Open).
tourBios.carHigh: Six-time winner on the Sunshine Tour, including the 2013 Polokwane Classic, 2014 Sun City Challenge, 2015 Golden Pilsener Zimbabwe Open, 2015 Lombard Insurance Classic, 2015 Sun Windmill Classic and the 2015 Vodacom Origins of Golf. 2015: With his four wins on the Sunshine Tour in 2015, won the Investec Cup, that Tour's FedExCup equivalent. Amateur: Winner of South Africa's International Team Championships in 2009, making the decision to turn pro the following year after that victory.
tourBios.personal: Lists Nick Price and Mark McNulty as his golfing inspirations growing up...Was born in Zimbabwe, but holds a South African passport.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR in 2016 is T39th at the Puerto Rico Open at Coco Beach.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 40th in Non-member Earnings on the PGA TOUR.
